Should you change your mind and would like to join us live, please see event details below:
Date: Tuesday, December 15, 2015 Time: 10AM PST- 1:00PM EST Join the Session <http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1075104/66BC9B414AB6694857D7B7177CD31B1A> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.Save the Date Organization Transformation :default=edit me}}

He reviewed how companies embracing the cloud native patterns of software delivery will survive and companies that donâ€™t - will not. Watch it now <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/the-cloud-native-journey?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-journey-webinar>!

Download it now <http://pivotal.io/platform/migrating-to-cloud-native-application-architectures-ebook?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-journey-webinar-matt-stine-ebook>!
